long_description: Offering a light touch during yoga from warm up to cool down, the Lole Vital Cardigan features smooth, cool-to-the-touch fabric and a relaxed look with a hood. Fabric blend provides light support, moisture-wicking performance and ample stretch. Fabric blend naturally resists odors; cotton content of fabric is organic. The Lole Vital Cardigan features a reflective logo and 22 in. length.
short_description: Offering a light touch during yoga from warm up to cool down, the Lole Vital Cardigan features smooth, cool-to-the-touch fabric and a relaxed look with a hood.
